text: No person shall offer or sell a security in the District unless the security is registered under this chapter, the security or transaction is exempt under § 31-5604.01 or § 31-5604.02, or the security is a federal covered security.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-203, see notes following § 31-5601.01.

Miscellaneous Notes

Section 806 of D.C. Law 13-203 provides: "Titles III and IV shall apply as of June 1, 2001."

DC CODE § 31-5603.01

Current through December 11, 2012
